If there were 78 stars in the night sky, and you pointed out all of those stars one by one, you’d be practicing patience and enjoying every celestial moment! It’s a beautiful number, and I hope every time someone sees it, it lights up their day as much as it does mine! 🌟

How about this: if you take 78 steps in a straight line each morning, you could walk around a small park in your neighborhood two and a half times. What a pleasant way to start the day with a bit of exercise and positivity!
